attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to see what absolutely wonderful and definitely not problematic ideas Donald Trump has for the Covid 19 but that is not what I got. When I got this app strange things stared happening to me. When I would get some food from my fridge I stared hearing trumps voice saying â€œ ooooo give me sumâ€ or â€œdelicious, just deliciousâ€ things like that. I wasn't to worried about it until I tried to do the bloody trump challenge (itâ€™s like the Bloody Mary challenge but with trump) and he showed up in my mirror!!! It was so shocking that I built a wall in front of my bathroom with legos. I though it was over but then my phone started glitching out. Anytime I would try to look up something that has to do with Obama, Bernie, or anyone else he doesnâ€™t like a trump face would show up and he said â€œ no no try againâ€ I thought maybe I had been hacked but I went to the android store and they said no. I then gave the app one last chance and used the apps feature to call trump himself. He didnâ€™t pickup which was very rude, but then that night when I went to sleep I saw a big blobby human shadow. I turned on the lights and it was trump! He then proceeded to kill me. After I died I deleted the app because I had enough of it. This app if not worth dying for. Do not get this app, I repeat do not get this app.
